Subject: [Critical] Upgrade Hotfix but Server is unaccessible
Description:
Hi Support,

We requires urgent assistance on this case as the EPP server is not accessible.
This occurs after customer did the live update for the EPP hotfix. After the hotfix is applied, they reboot the EPP Server and they are unable to configure the IP Address.

They restored to their backup but the issue still persists. Please refers to the attached video on the errors that they sees after booting up the EPP Server. 

Thank you!
Best regards,
Yi Zhen
Solution_Comment__c: Issue resolved by following the "Invalid gateway" procedure from Catalin S.
